newsitem.title: FINLAND: RAISIO TO NOT NAME BENECOL PARTNER IN JAN.
newsitem.headline: RAISIO TO NOT NAME BENECOL PARTNER IN JAN.

text.p: Finnish food, animal feed and chemicals group Raision Tehtaat Oy said on Monday talks with potential partners for production of its cholesterol-reducing Benecol margarine were still going on and no decisions would be made in January.
"It will be later," Raisio spokesman Jarkko Heino told Reuters by telephone.
He was asked to comment on an article in International Herald Tribune last Thursday quoting an Raisio executive as saying Raisio would choose its international partner in January.
"Negotiations are going and we have several options," Heino said, but declined to elaborate.
Raisio shares rose last week and continued to rise sharply on Monday as the article boosted overseas demand, brokers said.
At 1525/1325 GMT, Raisio traded at 345.00 markka, up 28.00 markka or almost nine percent, after hitting a life-high 350.00 markka.
